text: Trevor Rees-Jones (known as Trevor Rees; born 3 March 1968) was a German- British bodyguard of Diana, Princess of Wales. He was the sole survivor of the car crash in Paris that killed her in 1997. Due to a serious head injury, he has no memory of any details of the accident. Some media reports claimed that he was wearing a seat belt and survived, but investigations indicate that none of the car's occupants were wearing seat belts. Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Trevor Rees-Jones (bodyguard)
